content: गुरुता, --त्वं {@--1@} Weight, heaviness. {@--2@} Burden, trouble {@--3@} Dignity, greatness; <ls>U. 6. 19</ls>; लोके गुरुत्वं विपरीततां वा स्वचेष्टितान्येव नरं नयंति <ls>H. 2. 46</ls>; <ls>Śi. 16. 27.</ls> {@--4@} Respectability, venerableness. {@--5@} The office of a teacher. {@--6@} Importance. {@--7@} Universal gravitation.
